title: Advanced English Conversation Proficiency Program Using AI-Integrated Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: TOEIC score of 800+ or equivalent advanced English proficiency
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing job-relevant English speaking skills for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can generate natural English conversation scenarios of over 10 minutes per topic using AI tools.
Learners can use grammatical structures with over 80% accuracy during expert-level discussions in real-time video classes.
Learners can improve pronunciation and intonation errors by over 50% through the AI feedback system
Learners can complete a 5-minute English presentation tailored to job-related contexts via project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
